pages.title: Corrupted Golem
pages.text: Lvl 10 Boss. Be prepared! It drops an important ingredient that allows you craft the Modify Station.

pages.name: Boss Summoning
pages.text: Iron Blocks and Bone Blocks needed
With this you can craft the modify station, as it's not attainable in any other way.
With this station you can use currencies to modify gear. It's insanely useful for bettering your gear.
